text: Fit for Flogging is a 1993 album by the Danish musical project Leæther Strip, released on Cleopatra Records. Together with Penetrate the Satanic Citizen it bundles most of Leæther Strip's releases prior to Solitary Confinement. ==Track listing== # Antius # Black Gold # G.A.W.M. # Steal! # Go Fuck Your Ass Off! # Law Of Jante # Nosecandy # Fit For Flogging # Cast Away # The Nature Of God # Break My Back # Khomeini ==References== * Category:Leæther Strip compilation albums Category:1993 compilation albums Category:Cleopatra Records compilation albums
title: Fit for Flogging
